Legislation: McCain introduced the Clay Hunt Suicide Prevention for American Veterans Act to increase access to mental health support for veterans. He also led efforts to address the scandal over secret waiting lists at VA hospitals by pushing The Veterans’ Access to Care through Choice, Accountability, and Transparency Act to enactment.
Department of Veterans Affairs: McCain co-sponsored a bill to increase accountability at the department.
Non: legislative support: McCain's office employs five caseworkers dedicated to helping veterans who are facing problems at the Department of Veterans Affairs. They have handled over 2,000 veterans-related cases in 2015 alone.
Testimony from veterans groups: Even veterans groups who have criticized McCain's record on veterans disagreed with Trump's claim that McCain has done nothing to help veterans.
